wikipedia_page.main: Mordecai Cubitt Cooke (12 July 1825, in Horning, Norfolk – 12 November 1914, in Southsea, Hampshire) was an English botanist and mycologist. Cooke was the elder brother of art education reformer Ebenezer Cooke (1837 - 1913) and the father of book illustrator and water-colour painter William Cubitt Cooke (1866–1951).
